title: FRENCH STORY - L'Esprit de Noël - The Christmas Spirit

media:group.media:title: FRENCH STORY - L'Esprit de Noël - The Christmas Spirit
media:group.media:description:
// T R A N S C R I P T  &  T R A N S L A T I O N + vocab list
▶️ https://bit.ly/ChristmasStoryTranslation

French story: L'Esprit de Noël (The Christmas Spirit).
This story is mostly written using the present tense, near future and recent past so as to make it more accessible to beginners. That said, I'm sure you'll get something from it even if you're more advanced, as the story may include vocabulary you're not familiar with. Make sure to download the pdf so you can make best use of this video.

Click on the link above to download the transcript and line by line translation so you can check your understanding and learn some of the vocabulary contained in the story.

// A B O U T   M E

Bonjour ! I'm Cindy, a native French speaker. I moved to the UK in 2005,  am now bilingual in French and English, have a degree in modern languages (English and Spanish) and a passion for teaching French. I wish you good luck on your French learning journey, and if you ever have any doubts or questions regarding a particular aspect of the language, give me a shout! I'm always happy to help!
